type ResourcePermissionBase = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Allows control of code access security permissions.

span.span: Allows control of code access security permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类使用序号排序规则比较字符串，并忽略所比较的字符串的大小写。The class compares strings using ordinal sort rules and ignores the case of the strings being compared. ## Examples 下面的示例从继承类。The following example inherits from the class. 实现 4 种构造函数。4 kinds of constructors are implemented. 该示例还提供了一个名为类的实现`MailslotPermissionEntry`。The example also provides an implementation of a class called `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 属性的类型然后私下设置`MailslotPermissionEntry`。The property is then privately set to the type of `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 属性私下设置为"Name"和"计算机"。The property is set privately to "Name" and "Machine". [!code-cpp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CPP/resourcepermissionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CS/resourcepermissionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/VB/resourcepermissionbase.vb#1)]

span.span: for the right to control evidence.

span.para: 继承自，必须提供至少三个构造函数，设置两个属性，并提供第三个属性。所需的构造函数是： 默认构造函数、 采用作为参数，并尽可能为所需的执行属性的值。需要设置的属性是和。需要第三个属性是指返回的权限项。此类的实现的示例，请参阅。在，则属性私人设置为"计算机"和"类别"私下属性设置为的类型，和属性返回的权限项。

When you inherit from , you must provide at least three constructors, set two properties, and provide a third property. The required constructors are: a default constructor, one that takes a as a parameter, and as many as needed that take values for the properties. The properties that need to be set are and . The third property that is needed is one that returns the permission entries. For an example of an implementation of this class, see . In , the property is set privately to "Machine" and "Category", the property is privately set to the type of , and the property returns the permission entries.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission object that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission object that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.

returns.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current object and the specified target.

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current object and the specified target.

returns.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

span.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限对象的交集是描述两者共同持有的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permission objects is a permission that describes the set of operations they both hold in common. 具体而言，它表示要传递这两个权限的请求所需的最低权限。Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions required for a demand to pass both permissions.

param.name: target
param.span: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

span.span: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限对象指定一组操作完全包含的指定的权限对象，当前权限对象是指定的权限对象的子集。The current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object if the current permission object specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission object. 例如，表示对 C:\Example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\Example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限对象表示对受保护资源的访问权限不会超过指定的权限对象。If this method returns `true`, the current permission object represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission object. 此方法始终返回`false`当指定的权限对象属于与当前权限对象的不同的类型。This method always returns `false` when the specified permission object is of a different type than that of the current permission object.

summary.span: Creates a permission object that combines the current permission object and the target permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是表示当前权限对象和指定的权限对象所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission object and the specified permission object. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
